price: Say, “Call upon those whom you claimed [to be gods] besides Him; they have no power to remove harm or avert it from you.”
arabic: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ كَشۡفَ ٱلضُّرِّ عَنكُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡوِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
